text: Vellaisamy Thevar, known professionally as Madhurakavi Bhaskara Das, (Tamil:மதுரகவி பாஸ்கர தாஸ்) (1892–1952) was a popular Tamil film lyricist. In 1931 he wrote lyrics for H. M. Reddy's Kalidas movie. He was the first lyricist in the Tamil film industry. ==Filmography== Das wrote the lyrics for the music in the following films. * Kalidas - 1931 * Valli Thirumanam - 1933 * Bojarajan - 1935 * Chandragasan - 1936 * Raja Thesinggu - 1936 * Usa Kalyanam - 1936 * Dhevadas - 1937 * Sathi Agaliya - 1937 * Rajasegaran - 1937 * Kodaiyn Kadal - 1941 * Navena Thennairaman - 1941 ==Notes== ==References== Category:Lyricists Category:1892 births Category:1952 deaths Category:Tamil people Category:Tamil-language lyricists
title: Madhurakavi Bhaskara Das
